THE OBJECTIVE IS TO CREATE VISUALS AND AESTHETICS THAT IS LONG LOST TO 3D GAMING AND CHARACATER MODELING. THIS IS TO PROVIDE AN ULTRA REALISTIC 2D EXPERIENCE AND BLUR THE LINE BETWEEN CINEMA, GAMING AND GRAPHICS, AND A PHOTOREALISTIC RENDITION.

A NEW 2D GENRE OF CLASSIC GAMING REVISITED, GLOWING WITH PIXEL ART, ROUGH EDGES AND ASTONISHING RANGE OF EXPRESSION.

 

For NAA ODOFOLEY NORTON NORTEY. Play/Learn😊

GAME PLAY.

The game is set in a 2D platform environment, adapting color, modern pixel art and aesthetics in “rebirthing” gameplay and character bonding. IV walks, jumps and uses platforms to evade enemies and obstacles, there are no abilities, just your wits and relationship with IV in traversing the underworld, and well, the upper world; sliding down into an abyss of brimstone and awful, puzzle, yet beautiful traps to limit your survival. IV captures visuals – the images of city ruins, underneath the bright skies: a design that makes all seem pretty, yet on the edge.
